RelatedSentence: But the man who once polled as the most unpopular Republican in the entire country is expected to easily defeat challenger Matt Bevin in Kentucky 's Republican primary on Tuesday .

A1: challenger Matt Bevin in Kentucky 's Republican primary
RelatedSentence: Evidence of McConnell 's likely victory : The Real Clear Politics polling average shows McConnell leading Bevin by 26 points .
A McConnell win would come after his campaign pulled off two major feats early in the primary .

First , they secured Rand Paul 's endorsement - even hiring Paul 's senior adviser and family member as campaign manager - to ensure the libertarian - leaning senator 's grassroots following in the state would n't support a GOP challenger en masse .

In a pre-Election Day memo , McConnell campaign senior adviser Josh Holmes pointed out that Bevin and his allies spent a lot of money going after McConnell .
